TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GCHandle extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供從 Unmanaged 記憶體存取 Managed 物件的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to access a managed object from unmanaged memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構用於搭配列舉型別來建立對應至任何 managed 物件的控制代碼。The structure is used with the enumeration to create a handle corresponding to any managed object. 這個控制代碼可以是四種類型之一： `Weak`， `WeakTrackResurrection`， `Normal`，或`Pinned`。This handle can be one of four types: `Weak`, `WeakTrackResurrection`, `Normal`, or `Pinned`. 時已配置控制代碼，您可以使用它，以防止記憶體回收行程在 unmanaged 用戶端會保留唯一的參考時，收集受管理的物件。When the handle has been allocated, you can use it to prevent the managed object from being collected by the garbage collector when an unmanaged client holds the only reference. 沒有這類控制代碼，該物件可收集記憶體回收行程完成其工作，代表未受管理的用戶端之前。Without such a handle, the object can be collected by the garbage collector before completing its work on behalf of the unmanaged client. 您也可以使用建立傳回的記憶體位址，以防止記憶體回收行程移動物件在記憶體中固定的物件。You can also use to create a pinned object that returns a memory address to prevent the garbage collector from moving the object in memory. 當控制代碼超出範圍時您必須明確釋放它藉由呼叫方法;，否則為記憶體流失，可能會發生。When the handle goes out of scope you must explicitly release it by calling the method; otherwise, memory leaks may occur. 當您釋放固定的控制代碼時，相關聯的物件才會取消固定，而且會適合進行記憶體回收，如果不有任何其他參考。When you free a pinned handle, the associated object will be unpinned and will become eligible for garbage collection, if there are no other references to it. ## Examples 下列範例所示`App`建立受管理的物件，使用的控制代碼類別`GCHandle.Alloc`方法，以防止收集受管理的物件。The following example shows an `App` class that creates a handle to a managed object using the `GCHandle.Alloc` method, which prevents the managed object from being collected. 呼叫`EnumWindows`方法會傳遞委派，受管理的物件 （同時宣告為 managed 型別，但未顯示），並將轉換的控制代碼。A call to the `EnumWindows` method passes a delegate and a managed object (both declared as managed types, but not shown), and casts the handle to an . Unmanaged 函式類型傳回給呼叫端做為參數的回呼函式。The unmanaged function passes the type back to the caller as a parameter of the callback function. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance native int AddrOfPinnedObject() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取在 控制代碼中的物件位址。

span.span: Retrieves the address of an object in a handle.

returns.span: 作為 的釘選物件位址。

span.span: The address of the pinned object as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來取得物件的穩定的指標。This method is used to get a stable pointer to the object. 釘選的物件，可防止記憶體回收行程移動在記憶體中，因此也降低記憶體回收行程的效率。Pinning an object prevents the garbage collector from moving it around in memory, thereby reducing the efficiency of the garbage collector.

exception.span: 控制代碼是除了 以外的任何型別。

span.span: The handle is any type other than .

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 配置指定物件的控制代碼。

span.span: Allocates a handle for the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.GCHandle Alloc(object value) cil managed
Public Shared Function Alloc (value As Object) As GCHandle

span.span: The object that uses the .

summary.span: 配置 控制代碼給指定的物件。

span.span: Allocates a handle for the specified object.

returns.span: 保護物件不被記憶體回收的新 。

span.span: A new that protects the object from garbage collection.

returns.span: 當不再需要時，這個 必須使用 來釋放。

span.span: This must be released with when it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制代碼是不透明的這表示您無法解析的位址，其中包含透過控制代碼的物件。 handles are opaque, which means that you cannot resolve the address of the object it contains through the handle. ## Examples 下列範例所示`App`建立受管理的物件，使用的控制代碼類別`GCHandle.Alloc`方法，以防止收集受管理的物件。The following example shows an `App` class that creates a handle to a managed object using the `GCHandle.Alloc` method, which prevents the managed object from being collected. 呼叫`EnumWindows`方法會傳遞委派，受管理的物件 （同時宣告為 managed 型別，但未顯示），並將轉換的控制代碼。A call to the `EnumWindows` method passes a delegate and a managed object (both declared as managed types, but not shown), and casts the handle to an . Unmanaged 函式類型傳回給呼叫端做為參數的回呼函式。The unmanaged function passes the type back to the caller as a parameter of the callback function. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫端必須確保針對指定的控制代碼，只呼叫一次。The caller must ensure that for a given handle, is called only once. ## Examples 下列範例所示`App`建立受管理的物件，使用的控制代碼類別`GCHandle.Alloc`方法，以防止收集受管理的物件。The following example shows an `App` class that creates a handle to a managed object using the `GCHandle.Alloc` method, which prevents the managed object from being collected. 呼叫`EnumWindows`方法會傳遞委派，受管理的物件 （同時宣告為 managed 型別，但未顯示），並將轉換的控制代碼。A call to the `EnumWindows` method passes a delegate and a managed object (both declared as managed types, but not shown), and casts the handle to an . Unmanaged 函式類型傳回給呼叫端做為參數的回呼函式。The unmanaged function passes the type back to the caller as a parameter of the callback function. summary.span: 取得值，指出控制代碼是否已配置。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the handle is allocated.

value.span: 如果已配置控制代碼，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the handle is allocated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性使用時控制代碼，以判斷仍然可用。Use this property when using handles to determine if the is still available. 當記憶體回收行程會收集物件，控制代碼仍可以和完成項中。When the garbage collector collects the object, the handle can still be resurrected in the finalizer. 在此情況下，不配置控制代碼 （它是遺失時，記憶體回收行程會嘗試回收物件），即使目標物件是否有效。In that case, the handle is not allocated (it is lost when the garbage collector attempts to collect the object), even though the target object is valid.
